original_text: God has sent his prophet to warn the people of Ephraim. 9: Perhaps Hosea is talking about himself as the prophet that God has sent to warn his people. Ephraim is another name for Israel, the northern kingdom. But wherever he goes, people try to stop him. They speak angry words against him, even in the temple of his God. God has sent his prophet to warn the people of Ephraim. 9: Perhaps Hosea is talking about himself as the prophet that God has sent to warn his people. Ephraim is another name for Israel, the northern kingdom. But wherever he goes, people try to stop him. They speak angry words against him, even in the temple of his God. God has sent his prophet to warn the people of Ephraim.
korean_text: 에브라임은 나의 하나님과 함께 한 파수꾼이며 선지자는 모든 길에 친 새 잡는 자의 그물과 같고 그의 하나님의 전에는 원한이 있도다

sentences.original_text: to warn the people of Ephraim
Perhaps Hosea is talking about himself
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 호세아는 자기 자신에 대해 말하고 있는 것이다

sentences.original_text: as the prophet that God has sent
Ephraim is another name for Israel
They speak angry words against him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 향해 분노의 말을 한다

sentences.original_text: even in the temple of his God
